message.body: Hey you :)
hey there. :) how are you?
Doing all right. Just waiting to board my flight. How about you?
great. it's warm enough to lay out today so i'm out in the backyard in my chair with my kindle. ready to come back to the atl?
Laying out? Very nice :) I guess I'm ready. Should be a bit warmer at least.
mhm. no more snow for you, probably.
Probably not :(
About to take off. Catch you later?
for sure. fly safe!
Touched down, safe and sound :)
Hey :)
are you psychic today? i literally just got back to atlanta.
oh, and hi. :)
You know, I did have this feeling that Atlanta just got a little better ;)
cute. :) so how are you feeling now that you're back?
Still a bit worn out from travel and food shopping, but otherwise all right. It's hot down here, though! How about you?
not a lot of sleep last night, but i'm good. i called my boss to ask when she wanted to meet to plan for the new semester and she says, "how about right now!" maybe it's time for a nap for you?
Nothing like a meeting on short notice, huh? If only I could nap. Doesn't work for me unless I'm sick.
no way! you're seriously missing out. napping is a valuable skill.
A skill I often wish I had, haha.
Finish up your meeting?
yup! just got back.
Going to be working you like crazy again?
undoubtedly. my main concern right now is getting the studio ready for the semester. i'll finish up tomorrow morning before my friends get back. what're you up to?
Cooking dinner. Is it a lot of work to get the studio ready?
ooh, i'm jealous. anything good? and... eh. it's not hard, just tedious. cleaning shelves, counting out tools, etc. i spent most of today moving around/throwing out unclaimed work.
Sounds like a thrilling day. At least it's not too hard. Not cooking anything special. Kielbasi and pierogies. Polish Sunday dinner.
mmm.
If only there weren't cooking involved.
but that's half the fun! or at least a third.
Really? I'd be perfectly happy with just the eating.
obviously you are not destined for chef-dom.
That's an understatement ;)
So is that what you're up to on this beautiful night? Cleaning the studio?
unpacking. just finished. now to scrounge around for some dinner...
Scrounging sounds difficult.
it's certainly not fun.
Dining hall not open yet?
i'm not sure. possibly. but i'm looking pretty gross from all the cleaning at work, so i'm just gonna stick around here. (and enjoy the silence while it lasts.)
Well, don't starve yourself on account of being a little gross.
i found ramen, it's all good.
i appreciate your concern, though.
Quite the balanced meal ;)
Hey, I don't want you wasting away.
Classes start up tomorrow?
tuesday! sorry i didn't reply sooner, i fell asleep at like 9:30. i was really tired, i guess.
No worries. Good morning :)
morning. :) we're both up early today, i guess!
Guess so. Up to anything exciting this rainy morning?
i accidentally took the gallery key from work, so i've got to go return it before anyone realizes, haha. i'll finish up my other stuff while i'm there. what about you?
haha, the real reason you're up early. I've got to finish up some syllabuses and head into campus at some point this afternoon.
that and it's pretty hard to sleep in when you go to bed so early. are you teaching today? classes starting?
That does make sleeping in hard. Classes start today, but I have nothing on Mondays, so I'm just getting ready for tomorrow.
ooh, long weekends every weekend?
Yep. If I still had Fridays off it'd be even better.
then it'd almost be like not working at all, haha.
Haha, but it would be so nice!
Hey :) How was your day?
